title: Malzahar Bot: Say hi if you see me
body:
Read a light hearted story a while ago of some guy playing with a guy that pretended to be a bot, and everyone on the team had great fun with it. So using that as inspiration, I am doing the same but only playing Malzahar in any lane with any skin. It lightens up the mood and I've had great success, everyone's played well and complimented how good the "bots" are now.

So if you see me in the game, pick me a lane and request a skin! :D

Positive way of dealing with chat restriction lol

replies.body: *inb4 account permabanned for accusation of botting*
